about_the_game:
Trivia Clash is a video based trivia game that allows players to compete against their favorite celebrities in a head-to-head trivia competition.

Trivia Categories include:


Music
Movies
Sports
TV
Animals
Literature
Geography
Video Games
Famous Foods

Celebrity contestants in this edition include:


Adriana Chechik
Jill Kassidy
Adria Rae
Kate England
Alexis Adams
Emily Addison

content_descriptors.notes:
The mature content in this game is limited to two areas.

The first area is that, although this is a trivia game, the celebrity contestants in it are all adult film stars.  There is absolutely nothing pornographic or sexual about this game, but people can be ridiculously sensitive about the entire concept adult work to the point where the mere inclusion of adult actresses as contestants warrants mention here.

The second area is foul language.  The celebrity contestants had a lot of fun playing this game and were highly competitive.  As a result, they instinctively used strong language when reacting to getting some questions wrong.  Additionally, a small number of the questions used foul language as part of direct quotes from literary or artistic sources.
